mapper.insert: insert into EVALUATION_RECENT (ID, DEMENTIA, MENTAL_ILLNESS, CHRONIC_DISEASE, OTHER_DISEASES, FALL, LOST, CHOKING_FOOD, SUICIDE, OTHER, PROVIDER_NAME, PROVIDER_RELATIONSHIP, FILE_PATH, FILE_BASENAME) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dementia,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mentalIllness,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{chronicDisease,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otherDiseases,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fall,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lost,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{chokingFood,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{suicide,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{providerRelationship,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileBasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update EVALUATION_RECENT set DEMENTIA = #{dementia,jdbcType=CHAR}, MENTAL_ILLNESS = #{mentalIllness,jdbcType=CHAR}, CHRONIC_DISEASE = #{chronicDisease,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OTHER_DISEASES = #{otherDiseases,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FALL = #{fall,jdbcType=CHAR}, LOST = #{lost,jdbcType=CHAR}, CHOKING_FOOD = #{chokingFood,jdbcType=CHAR}, SUICIDE = #{suicide,jdbcType=CHAR}, OTHER = #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDER_NAME = #{providerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVIDER_RELATIONSHIP = #{providerRelationship,jdbcType=CHAR}, FILE_PATH = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_BASENAME = #{fileBasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, DEMENTIA, MENTAL_ILLNESS, CHRONIC_DISEASE, OTHER_DISEASES, FALL, LOST, CHOKING_FOOD, SUICIDE, OTHER, PROVIDER_NAME, PROVIDER_RELATIONSHIP, FILE_PATH, FILE_BASENAME from EVALUATION_RECENT where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
select ID, DEMENTIA, MENTAL_ILLNESS, CHRONIC_DISEASE, OTHER_DISEASES, FALL, LOST, CHOKING_FOOD, SUICIDE, OTHER, PROVIDER_NAME, PROVIDER_RELATIONSHIP, FILE_PATH, FILE_BASENAME from EVALUATION_RECENT
